thread.title: Health Solutions names former Transamerica Manager, Stacy McCusker, as Broker Relationship Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Health Solutions names former Transamerica Manager, Stacy McCusker, as Broker Relationship Manager
text:
CEDAR RAPIDS, Iowa, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Health Solutions, LLC today announced Stacy McCusker as Broker Relationship Manager. McCusker joined Health Solutions on January 1 st and will lead the company's national broker relations, reporting to EVP of Business Development, Sam Houston.
"McCusker is a world-class sales leader with expertise forging relationships and expanding value for brokers," said Houston. "Her successful track record of increasing broker success helps us accelerate our growth into new markets around the country. We're just thrilled to welcome her to the team."
McCusker, 31, joins Health Solutions from Transamerica where she most recently served as new business manager and broker business development leader. She helped lead the company's broker relations business, working with some of the industry's leading brokerages to help them build stronger and more profitable practices using sophisticated insurance-based solutions. McCusker managed seven brokerage distributions that were consistently in the Top Ten for premium annually.
A key focus for McCusker will be to drive adoption and support for the company's Wellnelyticsâ„¢ initiative, the flagship predictive analytics and clinical coaching solution announced last year by Health Solutions, LLC. She will provide consultative support to brokers, empowering them to incorporate best practices, technology, and support from the team at Health Solutions so they can grow their practices and protect key accounts.
"I'm overjoyed to join Health Solutions," said McCusker, "The company has created a significant innovation in the wellness industry and there is great potential for further growth around the country. I'm excited to utilize and enhance the expertise I acquired at Transamerica to help expand Health Solutions' presence. I can't wait to get to work with the amazing team that Dr. Jennifer Musick and Sam have built and watch Health Solutions really take flight in this industry."
ABOUT Health Solutions:
Health Solutions, LLC. is the financially accountable corporate wellness provider. Founded in 2004 and headquartered in Cedar Rapids, IA, Health Solutions has grown to become a leader in corporate wellness for performance-driving organizations. Health Solutions provides clinically-based wellness coaching that integrates biometric data and reporting to provide financially-sound wellness initiatives to decision-makers. To learn more, visit us at https://www.healthywithhsi.com/
Contact:
Jon LoDuca
Chief Marketing Officer
